questions.question: True or false? A benefit of organic content promotion is the ability to develop and deliver highly targeted content to consumers who will find the content most relevant.
Fill in the blank: To keep your content calendar agile, it shouldn’t extend more than ___________.
All of the following are attributes of a content creation workflow EXCEPT:
questions.answer: How much money it will cost to complete initiative

questions.question: You asked your colleague to provide feedback on a blog post you recently wrote. When they sent you their feedback, they made edits directly in the doc. Is this a best practice for a content editing process?
questions.answer: No, the editor should have tracked changes which would have shown you where they would apply recommended edits.

questions.question: True or false? You should use a consistent naming system to store and easily identify hosted files.
True or false? If you want to produce great content, then you need to hire an in-house content creator.
What can you do to make a headline more compelling?
questions.answer: Make a promise to the reader

questions.question: Fill in the blank: When creating a headline for your content, you should come up with ___________ different headlines.
True or false? Effective writers start by filling in the main points of their content and save writing the introduction and conclusion for after they’ve written their piece.
questions.answer: True, it can be overwhelming to write an introduction first without knowing where the content is headed.

questions.question: True or false? When possible, you should try and use extensive vocabulary in your writing.
questions.answer: False, extensive vocabulary makes you appear less credible and confident.

questions.question: Fill in the blank: The following sentence is an example of ____________ voice? “The grocery shopping was done by your father.”
To help increase awareness for an upcoming product launch, your manager increases paid promotion funds by 300%. Which channels could you disperse these funds to?
On which social network should you share content most frequently?
What does CRM stand for?
Which KPI is most likely to be a vanity metric?
There are three key components to sending the right email. Two of them are the right email and the right time. What is the third?
What occurs during the attract stage of the inbound methodology?
questions.answer: You focus on bringing prospects and customers to your social pages or website through relevant and helpful content.

questions.question: When does the engage stage of the inbound methodology begin?
questions.answer: The engage stage begins when a prospect or customer takes a desired action.

questions.question: What is the purpose of the delight stage of the inbound methodology?
Fill in the blanks: Tail winds are to ________ : as headwinds are to _________.
What is the difference between a brand keyword and a non-brand keyword?
questions.answer: A brand keyword includes a brand’s name, a non-brand keyword does not include a brand’s name

questions.question: Fill in the blank: A keyword set to _____ match type will display your ad if the search term includes that keyword, or a very close variation.
Fill in the blank: A keyword set to ______ match type will display your ad when the search term contains any or some combination or variations of the words in your keyword, in any order.
If you have a keyword set to broad match, but you want to select specific keywords that must be included in the search query for your ad to be displayed, what would you use?
Which of the following represents an exact match keyword?
Which of the following represents a broad match keyword?
What symbol would you use to add a negative keyword?
True or false: Quality score is an algorithm that scores each of your search ads on spelling and grammar.
From top to bottom, what should your search account structure hierarchy look like?
How many ad extensions should you include in your search ads?
questions.answer: As many as make sense for your business

questions.question: The inbound methodology is meant to support which business functions?

Scenario: Kyle is in a new role and looking to upskill, so he goes to Google to do some research. He finds a search engine listing that piques his interest and clicks it. He’s taken to a blog post on your site. He reads the post and sees there’s a content offer. He’s interested, but not sure he’s ready to give his information for it just yet. Below the offer, he sees a chatbot asking if he needs help so he clicks it to start a conversation. Which stage of the inbound methodology is Kyle in?
What stage of the buyer's journey is your audience in if they're choosing a free trial or consultation?
True or false? A content offer is something you create and publish in exchange for personal information, like an email address and a name.
True or false? Relevancy directly impacts ranking strength.
Fill in the blank: Once a search engine bot discovers your web page, it _______.
questions.answer: decides how relevant it is to certain search queries by indexing it based on signals like keywords used within it

questions.question: Which of the following is the best practice for optimizing the elements on a web page to reduce page size?

Scenario: Your business is going through a website redesign. The goal of the redesign is to update the look and feel of the website to better represent the brand. Your manager recommends a custom font to help make the content stand out. How should you respond?
questions.answer: "We should consider using a Google font because they're accessible to all web browsers."

questions.question: Fill in the blank: The ideal blog post title is _____ characters.
Which of the following is an example of a video in the delight stage?
questions.answer: A testimonial of one of your customers with relatable stories

questions.question: Fill in the blank: Videos related to __________ moments address company milestones, new product or service features, or other company-related updates.
Which of the following factors does YouTube pay attention to as part of its algorithm?
All of the following are key places your videos can appear on YouTube EXCEPT:

Your manager tasks you with getting more of your web pages displayed in the featured snippet on a search engine results page. The best way to increase the number of your web pages that appear in featured snippets is by _______?
questions.answer: answering a question in the form of a detailed list

questions.question: Which of the following places on Instagram can you use a link to click through to your website? Choose all that apply.
True or false? When getting started with a business Instagram account, consider purchasing at least 1,000 followers to make your brand look more credible and acquire followers at a faster rate.
When auditing your social media content, what questions should you be looking to answer? Choose all that apply.
answer: Does your Facebook text content resonate with your audience?
Are you posting Facebook content with videos?
Are you posting Facebook content with images?

questions.question: True or false? You shouldn't join a competitor's Facebook Group. Doing so would only help increase their visibility, making it harder for you to create and grow a Facebook Group for your business.
True or false? You can have more than one key result per objective.
Scenario: A phrase-match keyword for one of your ads is “traveling in Boston.” Which of the following search queries would generate this ad? Choose all that apply.
answer: Traveling in Boston during the winter

questions.question: True or false? To deliver an ad only to people searching for dress shoes for men, you could modify your broad match keyword to “+men’s dress shoes.”
True or false? If you’re just starting out with paid ads and don’t know exactly how your persona will be searching, move from a narrower search to a broad match.
Having an understanding of what you’re trying to achieve is the most important part of creating high-performing emails. What theme does this correlate to?
What are the two key actions to look at when optimizing each part of your email?
Fill in the blank: The ideal length of an email subject line is _____ characters.
___________ characters is the average character length that will appear on a mobile device for your email.
To provide a personalized experience to your email reader, which of the following best practices should you employ? Select all that apply.
answer: Mention an action the contact has taken with their company

questions.question: Which of the following is NOT an example of paid media?
True or false: You should include either budget information or a time estimate in your content creation plan.
During the decision stage of the buyer's journey, it's effective to use which of the following content formats? Select all that apply.
True or false? Your content creation framework should stay consistent over time.
questions.answer: False, as business goals and content change, so should your process to support them.

questions.question: True or false? You should post the same message across all of your social channels.
questions.answer: False, you should customize the message based on the platform.

questions.question: Which network has the longest life for a piece of content?
True or false? As buying behavior changes, the inbound philosophy will also evolve.
What is one benefit of running search ads for brand keywords?
questions.answer: They protect your traffic if a competitor bids on your brand keywords

questions.question: Fill in the blank: A keyword set to _____ match type will display your ad if the search term contains the same order of the words, but it can also contain additional words.
Which of the following represents a phrase match keyword?
What symbol would you use to add a broad match modifier?
What is the benefit of including ad extensions in your search ads?
What does it mean to have an inbound approach to doing business?
questions.answer: Your business focuses on empowering your prospects and customers, rather than forcing them to engage with you.

questions.question: Fill in the blank: Measuring your website’s authority comes down to assessing the volume and quality of the ____________.
questions.answer: backlinks you have to your website

questions.question: How could this sentence be corrected to cut out fluffy words? "I really just want to go to the arcade to play games in order to have fun."
questions.answer: “I want to go to the arcade to play games and have fun.”

questions.question: True or false? To help improve SEO, your URL should match the title of your blog post, word for word.
Which of the following is an example of a video in the engage stage?
questions.answer: A promotional video featured on a landing page

questions.question: True or false? Watching three seconds of a YouTube video is considered a view.
Which of these KPIs demonstrate social media ROI? Choose all that apply.
answer: Direct sales revenue from social media, such as orders that come in from a coupon or links into your website that lead to purchase.
Lead conversions from social media campaigns. This may vary from company to company but could include email signups, downloads of materials like an ebook, or activations of trial software.

questions.question: True or false? Adding a string of meaningless numbers to your Instagram username could appear spammy.
Fill in the blank: When performing a social media content audit, begin by looking at all of the content you’ve posted in the last _________.
Scenario: An exact-match keyword for one of your ads is "blue women's t-shirts." Which of the following search queries would generate this ad?
Fill in the blank: Words like “free” or “percent off” may not trigger spam filters for your email, but could ___________.
questions.answer: appear to be sent by a bot

questions.question: Which of the following is NOT an example of owned media?
What are the three stages of the buyer’s journey?
Fill in the blank: When planning the timing of content in a calendar, _______.
questions.answer: remain flexible to account for changes

questions.question: All of the following impact a website’s ability to rank on a search engine results page EXCEPT:
True or false? Website performance does not impact visibility on Facebook.
Which of the following is an example of a video in the attract stage?
questions.answer: A social video that shows off your brand’s personality

questions.question: Your manager asks your thoughts on how to increase visibility on the business’s YouTube channel. Which response best aligns with how YouTube’s algorithm works?
questions.answer: “YouTube wants viewers to watch videos all the way through. We should focus on creating more engaging video content.”

questions.question: True or false? Never use acronyms in your writing.
When is the most effective time to boost content on social media?
What’s an example of a measurable key result? Choose all that apply.
answer: Grow net new contact rate from 5.6% to 9% by the end of Q4
Improve the time on page above 3 minutes for all product-specific pages by the end of the month

questions.question: Scenario: Tom is an avid Facebook user. Tom's friend, Jane, posts a video from a travel-focused company called Get Out, Stay Out, about a new, local hiking trail. In the comments, Jane shares her thoughts and opinions about the trail. The following day, Tom's sister sends him the same video link through Facebook Messenger. The Facebook algorithm sees all these interactions. Keeping this in mind, it's likely Facebook will _______.
questions.answer: Feature the post at the top of Tom's news feed

questions.question: Fill in the blank: ________ refers to how well a document matches a search query.
